Web Linking (RFC 8288) Erik Wilde (@dret): Linking for Fun and Profit: Using Linksets in APIs

(6) One Model To Link Them All

  • Linking on the Web started with predefined HTML links
    • General-purpose links with <a href="â¦">anchors</a> and page-level <link/>
    • Special-purpose links (<img/>, <form/>, <blockquote/>, â¦)
  • Linking on the API Web needs link types and link representations
    • Web Links are typed 1:1 connections with optional target attributes [https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc8288#section-2]
    • Web Links can be represented in a specific HTTP header field [https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc8288#section-3]
